data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 271,607 lost in Hela that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hela, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Hela unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Hela do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Hela that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Hela.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Hela. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Hela, Papua New Guinea to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hela, Papua New Guinea has a population of 352,700.

We estimate Hela has 81,093 people who might know Jesus, 251,786 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,821 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Hela
location.people_groups_list: Chenapian, Ngala, Kara, Kabiano, Pei, Papi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chenapian (300), Ngala, Kara (300), Kabiano (1,500), Pei (300), Papi (100)
